content: *a feast of shadowy and light tones of lion brand multi-yarns are crocheted together to create this romantic wrap lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 30023 skill level intermediate 8 colors 1 ball each bulky weight yarn homespun® article #790 wool-ease® chunky article #630 chenille thick & quick® article #950 *discontinued* crochet hook - size n-13 9 mm *lion brand notes * this project is worked lengthwise from the neck down in a simple single_crochet-chain pattern on a large hook using bulky and super-bulky weight yarns the yarns change every row with the loose ends later bound with additional strands to make a fringe *pattern is available as pdf download only *
